name: Teddy's Crews
description:
This is the first public build of Teddy's Crews.

In the game, you play as Torb, trying to survive waves after waves of aggressive fishes.

It's endless at the moment, see how far you can go ╲ʕ·ᴥ·　╲ʔ

Controls:
- Move the mouse to make the Torb follow it

- Left Click to dash in the mouse direction

- Right Click to leave an Area of Effect attack. This has a short cooldown.

Tech:

- Phaser

- VueJs

- Electron

Seems the game is too bulky to be playable online on itch.io. I know the size can matter to some, I'll see what I can do

Developer Notes:

The development phase has been stale for a quite a while, and due to my diminishing motivation on working on it, I've decided to make a build that could be played and move on.

However, I do not really know if I'm 100% done with the game, R0d3nt (my first game) was tweaked a little bit after launch because of the feedback received.

I am happy I've made this.This game has helped me to learn a lot of great things, and my only disappointment is that it gave me much more than it could give to any of its players.
